name: GIRAL
description: In order to seal off a magical dungeon which suddenly appeared out of nowhere, the young feudal lord Giral tries her best to protect her newly appointed domain. This is a simple RPG in which battles consist of ramming into your opponent.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
